channel.title: LaTeX 101 on Latex Quickstart
channel.description: Recent content in LaTeX 101 on Latex Quickstart

item.title: Installation
item.description: Edit the config.toml file and change the mainSections key. Values will be directories where the blogs reside. 1 2 3 4 [params]...mainSections = ["posts", "docs", "blogs"]... For more info, see the Hugo docs. Mobile menu positioning The navigation menu when mobile browsing can be configured in config.toml to open right or left depending on preference. The "hamburger" menu icon will always display in the upper right hand corner regardless.

item.title: Editor Setup
item.description: Visual Studio Code Download Extension Setup

item.title: Syntax Highlighting
item.description: Code Display line numbers Choose whether to display line numbers within a code block globally with the parameter codeLineNumbers setting to true or false. 1 2 3 4 [params]...codeLineNumbers = true# Shows line numbers for all code blocks globally.... Limit code block height You can globally control the number of lines which are displayed by default for your code blocks. Code which has the number of lines exceed this value will dynamically cause two code block expansion buttons to appear, allowing the user to expand to full length and contract.
